attributes.action: HM Government should reject the petition calling for a second referendum.
attributes.additional_details: This is to oppose the other petition put up by people who only want their own way and will not abide by a democratic process
attributes.background:
There is a non-democratic petition put up by those who do not wish to abide by the majority of voters at the first referendum.  If this is allowed, we will continue to have referendums ad infinitum!
The majority of voters who did vote decided to Leave.  This is democracy!
